Polly | FT | Operations Manager, Head of Marketing, Senior Front-end Engineer | Seattle, WA | Onsite | https://www.polly.ai

Our mission is to make it easy for teams to measure their work - and we're doing it through a Slack-based survey product built for teams, not just managers, HR, and marketers. Come join a rapidly growing company, with a product used by tens of thousands of companies . We’ve got great traction and are growing fast (double-digit MoM growth for the past 3 years). We’re a team that values empathy and respect over technical chops (but you’ll need to have that too!). Here are the roles we’re hiring for:

  - Senior Front-end Web Developer: the rest of our developers will look to you for guidance and expertise. 
  - Operations Manager: highly organized individual that can take on various responsibilities at the company
  - Head of Marketing: Looking for someone with experience leading teams in a B2B SaaS industry
We also offer medical / dental / vision /parental leave / flexible vacation policy. Apply at samird@polly.ai and reference HN.
